ResearchTabDef.label: Glitterworld
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Research projects usually only ever seen on distant glitterworlds.

ResearchTabDef.label: Archotechnology
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription:
Research the vastly complex topics of Archotechnology to integrate a portion of their power into your arsenal.
[!] THIS BRANCH OF RESEARCH IS NOT BALANCED YET, BUT IS INCLUDED AS A ROUGH PREVIEW. [!]
